enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration - Reserved for Spanish Studies students.
title: WCAS SPANISH 206-0-21 Spanish for Professions: Business
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

Prerequisites apply, see description

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Advanced course for developing communication skills in Spanish for business purposes. Emphasis on language skills for the global marketplace: specialized terminology; writing; comprehension of cultural nuances in the Spanish-speaking business world.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Spanish 201, AP 5 on the Spanish Language Exam, or departmental placement

subject: SPANISH
